system.requirements:
Headhunter Alternative Advance, 1500xp
Good Reputation(Underworld), Intimidate +20
system.effect:
This Trait requires prerequisites that are not meant to be just gained through XP, instead through play. It is something to be earned through forging a reputation worthy of Fear. It is not an easy feat.
If the prerequistes are earned to a satisfactory degree they may purchase this talent. The character gains the Fear(1) Trait.
